bioAsHtml: I had been involved in various data intensive fields (algo trading, text mining and data mining). I have gained experience in data intelligence for entrepreneurial boutiques, start up and hedge-funds. I also co-organize meetings devoted to predictive analytics for business (2 000+ academic researchers, startup entrepreneurs, innovators and geeks)

acceptedTalks.track: Big Data, Machine Learning, IA & Analytics
acceptedTalks.title: BOF : Paris Machine Learning

bio:
I had been involved in various data intensive fields (algo trading, text mining and data mining). 
I have gained experience in data intelligence for entrepreneurial boutiques, start up and hedge-funds.
I also co-organize meetings devoted to predictive analytics for business
